creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Dr and Mrs Sherman Lee
description: skeletal figure in profile seated in hunched position, drawing legs up to body; grotesque face with dark, hollow eyes, upturned nose, and a few visible teeth
marks: Signature and Seals LRC: [ 戊辰春日作土井生 ] [Tsuchinoe tatsu shunnichi saku
title: Rakan Rock
